metaTitle: PORTO MARINA PLAZA Pilar de La Horadada | From €309,000
metaDescription: PORTO MARINA PLAZA in Pilar de La Horadada. Bungalows, villas & apartments from €309,000. Completion 2026. GRUPO COSTA CALIDA development.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to PORTO MARINA PLAZA, an exclusive residential development in Torre De La Horadada by the renowned GRUPO COSTA CALIDA. This premier project showcases modern architectural design combined with Mediterranean living at its finest. Located in the vibrant coastal town of Pilar de La Horadada, Alicante, PORTO MARINA PLAZA offers an exceptional opportunity to own a new property in one of Spain's most sought-after coastal destinations. With completion scheduled for 01-12-2026, this development features 6 available units comprising elegant bungalows, villas, and apartments with 2-4 bedrooms, designed for families, investors, and lifestyle seekers alike. Each property is meticulously crafted with premium finishes, modern amenities, and thoughtful layouts ranging from 68-132m² of built space on plots spanning 14-292m². Starting from just €309,000, PORTO MARINA PLAZA represents outstanding value, positioned 40% below Spanish island market prices while offering superior accessibility to beaches, golf courses, and international amenities. The established international community in Pilar de La Horadada ensures excellent rental potential with average 7-night rates of €800, making this an attractive investment opportunity with demonstrated +8% year-on-year property appreciation.

locationSection.intro: Torre De La Horadada is a picturesque coastal area in Pilar de La Horadada, Alicante, representing one of the Costa Blanca's most desirable residential destinations. This charming Mediterranean location seamlessly blends natural beauty with modern convenience, attracting international buyers seeking authentic Spanish coastal living. The area is renowned for its pristine beaches, excellent climate, and comprehensive infrastructure supporting both permanent residents and seasonal visitors. Pilar de La Horadada has developed into a thriving expatriate hub with a well-established English-speaking community, making it ideal for international property buyers. The region boasts modern healthcare facilities, quality international schools, and abundant shopping and dining options. Tower De La Horadada's strategic position on the Costa Blanca provides easy access to major amenities while maintaining the tranquil, leisurely atmosphere that defines Mediterranean lifestyle. The combination of natural coastal beauty, reliable sunshine, accessible healthcare, and strong community infrastructure makes this location particularly attractive for those seeking property investment or a permanent European residence.

propertyFeatures.intro: PORTO MARINA PLAZA properties showcase contemporary construction standards with premium materials and meticulous attention to detail. Each property benefits from solid construction techniques, modern building regulations compliance, and high-quality finishes throughout. The development emphasizes sustainability, comfort, and aesthetic appeal with designs suited to Mediterranean living. All units feature climate-appropriate specifications including pre-installation for air conditioning, ensuring year-round comfort. The properties combine functional family living spaces with elegant design elements, maximizing natural light and ventilation. GRUPO COSTA CALIDA's reputation for quality construction is evident in every aspect, from structural integrity to interior specifications, ensuring long-term property value and resident satisfaction.

content.investmentSection: PORTO MARINA PLAZA represents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Spain's fastest-growing coastal markets. The Pilar de La Horadada property market demonstrates robust +8% year-on-year appreciation, significantly outperforming broader European real estate trends. Positioned 40% below comparable Spanish island markets, entry prices from €309,000 offer exceptional value proposition. Rental potential is particularly attractive, with 7-night average rates reaching €800, generating approximately €20,800 annually per property. The established expatriate community and international visitor traffic ensure consistent rental demand throughout the year. GRUPO COSTA CALIDA's track record and the region's ongoing infrastructure development support sustained property value growth. International buyers benefit from favorable currency positioning and tax-efficient ownership structures. The combination of appreciation potential, rental income generation, and strategic location makes PORTO MARINA PLAZA an ideal choice for portfolio diversification and long-term wealth building in the European property market.

faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Pilar de La Horadada is an excellent property market with an established international community where English is commonly spoken. The area demonstrates +8% year-on-year property appreciation, has Regional hospitals within 30 minutes with English-speaking doctors, Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, and several championship golf courses nearby. It's an ideal location for both lifestyle and investment purposes.

faqs.answer: PORTO MARINA PLAZA is within 20 minutes of Multiple Blue Flag beaches, providing easy beach access while maintaining quiet residential surroundings. The proximity to pristine beaches is one of the development's key lifestyle advantages for residents seeking Mediterranean coastal living.

faqs.question: What amenities are near PORTO MARINA PLAZA?
faqs.answer: Extensive amenities surround the development: Shopping (Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets), Healthcare (Regional hospital within 30 minutes, Private clinics with English-speaking doctors), Golf (Several championship courses nearby), Education (International schools with British curriculum), Dining and Leisure (Excellent restaurants and bars), Transport (Bus connections available, Alicante Airport 30 minutes away).

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, non-EU foreign nationals can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. You'll need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and can engage a Spanish lawyer to facilitate the purchase process. Most European and international buyers find the Spanish property purchase straightforward and well-regulated.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect additional costs including: Transfer Tax (6-10%), Notary fees (0.5-1%), Registry fees (0.2%), and Lawyer fees (0.5-1%). Total additional costs typically range 7-11% of purchase price. Your lawyer will provide a detailed breakdown of all applicable costs for your specific purchase.

faqs.question: What are property taxes in Spain?
faqs.answer: Annual property tax (IBI) averages 0.4-0.6% of cadastral value annually. Rental income is taxed at 19-45% depending on your residency status. Non-residents may also face wealth tax. We recommend consulting with a Spanish tax advisor to understand your specific tax obligations based on residency and income source.

content.conclusion: PORTO MARINA PLAZA offers the perfect combination of Mediterranean lifestyle, investment potential, and modern comfort. With properties from €309,000, scheduled completion in 2026, and locations within minutes of pristine beaches and championship golf, this GRUPO COSTA CALIDA development represents an exceptional opportunity. The established international community, strong +8% annual appreciation, and robust €800 weekly rental potential make this investment both lifestyle-enhancing and financially prudent. Whether seeking a European residence, holiday home, or portfolio investment, PORTO MARINA PLAZA delivers sophisticated living in Torre De La Horadada's most desirable coastal setting. Properties at this price point and quality level are increasingly scarce in prime Costa Blanca locations. Contact our team via WhatsApp today for detailed information, availability, and to arrange viewings. Your Mediterranean dream awaits—don't let this opportunity pass.
